targets.legendFormat: System - Processes executing in kernel mode
User - Normal processes executing in user mode
Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode
Inactive - Memory that is completely free and ready to use
Active - Memory currently being used by a process
Cache - Memory being used to cache data, can be freed immediately if required
Wired - Memory in use by the Kernel
Free -  Memory that has been freed but is still cached since it may be used again
